Articles.Content:
So, I'm trying to start a part mod and I'm following this set of tutorials: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mFRICd-0zYo

 

 

No matter how I modify the Transform on the GameObject it doesn't make any difference in KSP.

I'm using the latest version for Unity and PartTools.

I don't see anyway to transform the mesh object.

Edited August 19, 2018 by macktruck6666

[MOD - Moved to Modelling and Texturing Discussion subforums, as that is the place to discuss issues with Unity and PartTools]

Since you've now marked the thread as solved, could you explain how you managed to transform the mesh object? It might help another modder experiencing the same issue.
